sections.title: Casting Spells
sections.description: Comprehensive rules for how to cast spells, including spell selection, concentration, counterspells, caster level effects, spell failure conditions, and how multiple magic effects interact

sections.title: Spell Descriptions Overview
sections.description: How to read and understand spell stat blocks, including all the standard components like schools, descriptors, components, range, duration, saves, and spell resistance

sections.title: Abjuration School
sections.description: Rules for abjuration spells, which are protective spells that create barriers, negate abilities, harm trespassers, or banish creatures

sections.title: Conjuration School
sections.description: Rules for conjuration spells and their five subschools: calling, creation, healing, summoning, and teleportation

sections.title: Divination School
sections.description: Rules for divination spells that reveal secrets, predict the future, find hidden things, and foil deceptive spells, including scrying subschool

sections.title: Enchantment School
sections.description: Rules for enchantment spells that affect minds, including charm and compulsion subschools

sections.title: Evocation School
sections.description: Rules for evocation spells that manipulate magical energy to create something from nothing and often deal large amounts of damage

sections.title: Illusion School
sections.description: Rules for illusion spells that deceive the senses or minds, including figment, glamer, pattern, phantasm, and shadow subschools, plus disbelief mechanics

sections.title: Necromancy School
sections.description: Rules for necromancy spells that manipulate death, unlife, and life force, including many undead-related spells

sections.title: Transmutation School
sections.description: Rules for transmutation spells that change properties of creatures, things, or conditions, including detailed polymorph subschool mechanics

sections.title: Spell Descriptors
includes_subheadings: #### Additional Information on the Evil Descriptor
sections.description: Complete list and rules for spell descriptors like acid, air, chaotic, cold, curse, darkness, death, disease, evil, fear, fire, force, good, language-dependent, lawful, light, mind-affecting, poison, and others

sections.title: Aiming Spells and Areas of Effect
includes_subheadings: #### Bursts and Emanations and Larger Creatures
sections.description: Rules for targeting spells, including targets, effects, areas, rays, bursts, emanations, spreads, cones, cylinders, lines, spheres, and line of effect

sections.title: Arcane Spells
includes_subheadings: #### Adding Spells to a Wizard's Spellbook
#### Writing a New Spell into a Spellbook
sections.description: Complete rules for arcane spellcasting, including wizard spell preparation, spellbook management, learning new spells, and spontaneous casting for sorcerers and bards

sections.title: Divine Spells
sections.description: Rules for divine spellcasting, including how clerics, druids, paladins, and rangers prepare and cast divine spells, plus spontaneous casting abilities

sections.title: Special Abilities
sections.description: Rules distinguishing between spell-like abilities, supernatural abilities, extraordinary abilities, and natural abilities

sections.title: Antimagic
sections.description: Rules for how antimagic fields and effects work, including what they suppress, dispel, and allow to function normally

sections.title: Dealing with Wishes
sections.description: GM guidance on handling wish spells, including types of wishes, making good and bad wishes, twisting wishes, and deferred results

sections.title: Research and Designing Spells
sections.description: Guidelines for creating new spells, including spell categories, level-appropriate design, required components, research costs, and skill checks

sections.title: Devil True Names and Infernal Sigils
sections.anchor_heading: ## Devil True Names and Infernal Sigils
includes_subheadings: ### Discovering True Names and Infernal Sigils
sections.description: Rules for discovering and using devil true names and sigils to gain power over fiends, including research methods and interrogation techniques

sections.title: Summoning Daemons
sections.description: Detailed rules and guidance for summoning daemons, including magic circles, names, texts, and specific daemonic grimoires

sections.title: Spells of the Wild
sections.description: Comprehensive guide to wilderness-themed spells organized by level ranges, covering nature magic, terrain manipulation, weather control, and survival spells
